Sentencas: Nanocrystalline YDC thin films with grain-sizes ranging from 38 to 93-nm were prepared using pulsed laser deposition followed by thermal annealing.
Titulo: Grain boundary blocking of ionic conductivity in nanocrystalline yttria-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: Ionic conductivity decreased up to four orders of magnitude as the grain size increased.
Titulo: Grain boundary blocking of ionic conductivity in nanocrystalline yttria-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: Using energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy, we showed that the counter-intuitive reduction in conductivity with grain-size is likely due to dopant and impurity segregation near grain-boundaries.
Titulo: Grain boundary blocking of ionic conductivity in nanocrystalline yttria-doped ceria thin films

Sentencas: Spectroscopic evidence suggests that the blocking effect due to defect segregation is more dominant on ionic conductivity than the grain-sizes.
Titulo: Grain boundary blocking of ionic conductivity in nanocrystalline yttria-doped ceria thin films
Grain boundary blocking of ionic conductivity in nanocrystalline yttria-doped ceria thin films
